parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the daytime running lights can reduce the visibility of the vehicle, making it difficult for other drivers to see it, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The daytime running lights stop working without warning signs or notifications
reducing visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The narrow cone of light projected forward by the headlights can make it difficult to determine if it is safe to turn, especially when turning from one dark road onto another dark road.
symptoms: The light cone is blocked by the escutcheon around the headlight
which is set inward too deep
making it difficult to see when turning.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear lights, including brake lights, can reduce the visibility of the vehicle, making it difficult for other drivers to see it, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The rear lights can be turned off when a bright light is shone on the rear red lenses
disabling the brake lights
and there are no warning lights that pop up when the rear lights or brake lights go out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate lighting can make it difficult to drive safely, especially at night, which can lead to accidents.
symptoms: The light intensity of the main beam is insufficient for proper night driving on dark roads.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and uncommanded activation of the lane keep assist feature can cause the vehicle to swerve or move unexpectedly, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The lane keep assist feature activates without driver input or warning
the steering wheel turns abruptly
the vehicle moves from side to side
the driver must take corrective action to maintain control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure or lock-up of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become difficult or impossible to turn, increasing the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The power steering is disabled or locked
the steering wheel is difficult or impossible to turn
the vehicle is unable to be driven.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Stalling and Loss of Steering
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden stalling of the engine and loss of steering can cause the vehicle to become unstable and increase the risk of accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The engine dies
the cluster shows a red triangle and alarm message
the steering wheel vibrates
the vehicle is unable to be moved.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective windshield can crack or shatter due to minor impacts, such as small pebbles or even no apparent strike, impairing visibility and creating an unsafe driving experience.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters with minimal or no external impact
cracks form from the A-pillar or other areas not related to rock chips
windshield noise or sudden cracking sound.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wipers can impair visibility during rain or other weather conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Windshield wipers fail to turn on or function properly
especially during rainstorms.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the A-Pillar trim can cause it to detach from the vehicle while driving, potentially causing accidents or injuries to occupants or other road users.
symptoms: Rattling or fluttering noise from the A-Pillar
A-Pillar trim comes loose or falls off while driving
A-Pillar trim mounting bolt is pulled out.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected cracking of the windshield can obstruct the driver's view, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Windshield cracks or shatters without any apparent cause or warning
no impact or temperature gradients.
